title: Stay a Little Longer, Save a Little More!

banner_image.name: Deluxe-Double-Double
banner_image.alt: Stay a Little Longer, Save a Little More!

description:
• Stay 3+ nights, save 15%
  • Stay 5+ nights, save 20%
  • Stay 7 nights, save 25%

Rate includes the following complimentary amenities:

  • Daily WiFi in room and public areas
  • New York Times newspaper
  • Access to 24-hour fitness center
terms_list:
• Rates are available through December 31, 2017.
  • Blackout dates and restrictions may apply.
